docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, June 17--Uruguay's police have discovered a Nazi military plot to seize Uruguay with the help of German war veterans from Argentina and to turn this country into an agricultural colony of the Third Reich.

docs.snippet: The answer to France's plea for peace negotiations has not yet come from Chancellor Hitler. The terms will be set today at a meeting between the Chancellor and Premier Mussolini.

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, June 18 (AP)-- Informed Argentine sources declared today that the South American nations, dependent on substantial export trade balances for financial and political stability, needed material aid from the United States to avert...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, June 18 (AP)-- Informed Argentine sources declared today that the South American nations, dependent on substantial export trade balances for financial and political stability, needed material aid from the United States to avert domination by totalitarian powers in Europe.
